mapper.select: SELECT employee_no , employee_name , department_name , rank_name FROM employees WHERE 1=1 AND company_code = #{companyCode} AND (department_name = ( SELECT department_name FROM employees WHERE employee_no = #{employeeNo}) OR employee_resp IN ('관리직' , '임원'))

SELECT DISTINCT da.employee_no , da.doc_no , e.employee_name , e.department_name , e.rank_name , e.employee_resp , r.rank_ranking FROM doc_access da JOIN employees e ON da.employee_no = e.employee_no JOIN rank r ON e.rank_name = r.rank_name WHERE 1=1 AND da.reference = 1 AND da.doc_no = #{docNo} AND da.company_code = #{companyCode} ORDER BY r.rank_ranking ASC
